title: High School Disaster Management Training Program: Field-Centered Education Utilizing Drones and Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster management concepts and understanding of community safety issues
context.additional_context: Focuses on Enhancing Problem-Solving Skills by Experiencing Real Disaster Scenarios and Utilizing Drones/Gamification Tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three regional risk factors by analyzing past disaster cases.
Learners can identify five or more potential problems during a disaster and propose response strategies.
Learners can simulate evacuation routes using drones and design optimal evacuation plans.
Learners can recreate disaster management decision-making processes through role-playing by applying gamification elements.
Through team-based projects, learners can develop disaster response manuals and pass presentation evaluations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
